entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 16 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
